Nokia and Microsoft will combine our strengths to deliver an ecosystem with unrivalled global reach and scale. It's now a three-horse race. `` I am excited about this partnership with Nokia,'' added Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer .`` Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation and scale. As the American people engage on this issue, I like our chances. In the meantime, Republicans, Mike Pence says, will use the`` power of the purse'' to block Obamacare's implementation.`` We have a wide variety of legislative tools available.''

The online version of its Dynamics CRM Software will be now available in 40 countries and in 41 languages at a promotional offer of$ 34 per user per month for 12 months. Steve Ballmer said: This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud.
